channel.title: choropleths in Hexagonal Gallery
channel.description: Posts about choropleths in Hexagonal Gallery

item.title: The daily growth of OSM nodes
item.description: A linear model was fitted for each country, showing the evolution of OpenStreetMap through its daily created nodes.

item.title: Estimating OpenStreetMap nodes by Country
item.description: A methodology based in web scraping is presented, in order to generate a choropleth map of accumulated nodes in each country.
